snippet: Paula Radcliffe, the 38-year-old marathon record holder, says her preparations for the London Olympics are being hampered by a foot problem that has flared up during training.
abstract: Paula Radcliffe, the 38-year-old marathon record holder, says her preparations for the London Olympics are being hampered by a foot problem that has flared up during training; other Olympics news noted.
lead_paragraph: Paula Radcliffe, the 38-year-old marathon record holder, says her preparations for the London Olympics are being hampered by a foot problem that has flared up during training.
